name: Seasons of Rocco
description: Vivid Visions Studio was founded back in October of 2023, as part of our Bachelor program at the Rotterdam of Applied Sciences in The Netherlands. We're a team of 17 students, starting our very first game development project. For our debut in the gaming world, we aimed to bring more positivity into the industry. With "Seasons of Rocco," we're taking our first steps toward creating a wholesome gaming experience. We're excited to see what the future will bring!
